Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Requires employers to display a poster containing information on veterans' benefits and services which shall be created and distributed by the department of labor
Summary: Requires employers to display a poster containing information on veterans' benefits and services which shall be created and distributed by the department of labor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring employers to display a poster containing information on veterans' benefits and services which shall be created and distributed by the department of labor
